import React from "react"; import './Rules.css'; const Rule=()=>{ return(

RULES AND REGULATIONS

The hostel mess is an essential facility that provides food and sustenance to the residents of Siberia Men's Hostel in Cochin University of Science and Technology (CUSAT). To maintain a conducive and harmonious environment, the following rules and regulations are implemented for the proper functioning of the mess:

Mess Timings: The mess will operate according to pre-defined timings for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Residents must adhere to these timings to avoid overcrowding and ensure the smooth functioning of the mess.

Meal Tokens: Each resident will be provided with a meal token that should be presented at the mess counter during every meal. These tokens are not transferable and should be used only by the designated resident.

Attendance and Payments: Regular attendance at the mess is expected from all residents unless prior intimation has been given. Mess fees or dues should be paid promptly within the specified timeframe.

Hygiene and Cleanliness: Maintaining hygiene is of utmost importance in the mess. All residents are expected to wash their hands before entering the mess and maintain personal cleanliness while dining. Food should be handled and consumed hygienically.

Proper Usage of Utensils: Residents should handle the mess utensils with care and return them to the designated area after use. Taking utensils outside the mess is strictly prohibited.

Food Wastage: Residents are encouraged to take only the required amount of food to minimize wastage. Deliberate wastage of food is not tolerated, and appropriate action will be taken against offenders.

Dietary Restrictions: Residents with specific dietary requirements or medical conditions should inform the mess in-charge in advance to accommodate their needs, if possible.

Smoking and Alcohol: Smoking and consumption of alcohol are strictly prohibited inside the mess premises.

Disorderly Conduct: Any form of disruptive or unruly behavior inside the mess will not be tolerated. Residents are expected to maintain decorum and respect fellow residents and mess staff.

Guest Policy: Guests are not allowed inside the mess unless accompanied by a resident. Residents are responsible for their guests' behavior and must ensure they follow the mess rules.

Feedback and Suggestions: The mess committee welcomes constructive feedback and suggestions from the residents to improve the quality of services provided.

Mess Committee: A Mess Committee comprising residents and mess staff will be formed to oversee the mess's operations and address any issues or grievances.

Adherence to Rules: Non-compliance with mess rules and regulations may result in penalties or temporary suspension of mess facilities.

); }; export default Rule;
